In reference to your letter of April Sth to Mr. John
Carnbus our Station Manager at WDET, let me say that I
have not as yet seen a bill for the NAEB-TV Research
Factsheet and will be most happy to pay same if I know
how much I owe you.
(I
As I understand the note at the bottom of the
letter, our material from the NAEB is now being add¬
ressed to John Carnbus our Station Manager. If the
NAEB wants a single name for all material then this
situation should remain as is since we are most con¬
cerned that the tape network material get to Carnbus
directly. If it is possible to have material sent
-isut to two different people at the same institution,
then I would like such things as the NAEB-TV Research
Factsheets, the Newsletter or anything which does not
deal directly with the operation of the network and the
radio station to be sent to me.
